game.name: Civilization V - Cradle of Civilization Map Pack: Mesopotamia
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: This is the traditional Western and Middle Eastern “Cradle of Civilization." It includes the Fertile Crescent, with the Nile River valley to the west and extending east down the Tigris and Euphrates river valleys to the Persian Gulf. The Cradle of Civilization map packs are Firaxis-designed maps of
